faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about integrating HopeVisionAI.

items.question: How is health data protected?
items.answer: Security is our absolute priority. All data is encrypted end-to-end and hosted on HDS-certified (Health Data Host) servers in France, in strict compliance with GDPR.

items.question: Does HopeVisionAI integrate with my current medical software?
items.answer: Yes. Thanks to our FHIR and HL7-compatible API, HopeVisionAI interfaces with the majority of EHRs (Electronic Health Records) and practice management software on the market without disrupting your workflow.

items.question: Does AI replace physician diagnosis?
items.answer: Absolutely not. HopeVisionAI is a Clinical Decision Support System (CDSS). It provides analyses and prioritizes risks, but clinical validation and final decision always belong to the practitioner.

items.question: What is the accuracy of image analysis models?
items.answer: Our models achieve 98.5% sensitivity on standard pathologies (validated by clinical study). The system continuously learns through expert clinician feedback loops.
